UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design and Characterization of a Novel Hybrid Antimicrobial Peptide OM19R Based on Oncocin and MDAP-2.
Literature.Author: Liu L, Liu J, Cui Q, Jia B-Y, Pei Z-H, Odah KA, Wang Y-M, Dong W-L, Kong L, Ma HX

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=128µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 del-sbmA(MIC=256µM),Salmonella typhimurium CMCC 50115(MIC=64µM),Shigella flexneri ATCC 12022(MIC=128µM),Shigella flexneri CMCC 51572(MIC=128µM),Shigella dysenteriae CMCC 51252(MIC=128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=512µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae CMCC 46117(MIC=512µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>512µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>512µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 63501(MIC=>512µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(0-10% Killing=512µM)
